metadata.title: CVE-2023-45919 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Mesa 23.0.4 was discovered to contain a buffer over-read inglXQueryServerString(). NOTE: this is disputed because there are no commonsituations in which users require uninterrupted operation with anattacker-controller server.

criterions.comment: mesa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
